name: geojson-bbox
description: Calculates extent/bbox for a given valid geojson object.

0.0.0.name: geojson-bbox
0.0.0.description: Calculates extent/bbox for a given valid geojson object.

scripts.build-debug: browserify geojson-bbox.js --debug --standalone bbox | exorcist dist/geojson-bbox.js.map > dist/geojson-bbox.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
